description: Kokiri Slingshotters would do whatever it took to win the competition... within the rules of course. Many developed an amazing quick draw, allowing them to fling their ammo at impressive speeds.
tooltip: Kokiri Slingshotters would do whatever it took to win the competition... within the rules of course. Many developed an amazing quick draw, allowing them to fling their ammo at impressive speeds. (+20% Attack Rate - Slingshotters and Watchtowers)
